overview: David decides to end it all on vacation in Cancun. He heads out there with his best friends Angel and Kimodo. He lost his wife 10 years ago in 9/11. He has been feeling attracted to his art student and knows now that his life is over. She is half his age. When on this resort he believes he sees a plot unfolding. His friends think hes crazy. Is he? Numbness versus wide awake terror.
title: The Last Rezort
